creator: adam@angeli.org
text:
In manager-howto.xml, the example ant build.xml file contains an incorrect task.
 The "undeploy" target references the "remove" task.  That task is never
defined.  I think it should reference the "undeploy" task.

Created attachment 12247
Changes the "remove" target to the "undeploy" target.
creator: adam@angeli.org
yoavs@computer.org
text: Fixed, thanks for pointing it out.
*** Bug 31456 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
creator: martin@wolf-net.info
